sentences.en: As the Cultural relics department warned, the security technology employed in the museum was seamless, so the major fault lay in the security guards’ irresponsibility and indolence.
sentences.cn: 正如文物部门警告，目前博物馆安保技术已无懈可击，但最大的漏洞在于人员的意识和责任心，懒惰成性。

sentences.en: Does indolence of head work rest painful with what medicine?
sentences.cn: 上班头不痛休息痛用什么药?

sentences.en: Draw me not aside to indolence and pride.
sentences.cn: 不要使我偏离到懒惰和骄傲。

sentences.en: He was noted for his indolence.
sentences.cn: 他的懒惰是出了名的。

sentences.en: His failure was due to his indolence.
sentences.cn: 他的失败应归咎于不努力.

sentences.en: How to a headache a little while a little while indolence ah?
sentences.cn: 怎么一会儿头痛一会儿又不痛啊?

sentences.en: Human is always indolence, we must beat our nature .
sentences.cn: 人总是懒惰，我们必须击败我们的本性。

sentences.en: I have seen this happen. Just last week my minor crimes of indolence cost two companies about eighty man-hours.
sentences.cn: 我见过这样的事，就在上周，我的懒惰导致两家公司多花费了八十工时。

sentences.en: In Shirley's nature prevailed at times an easy indolence.
sentences.cn: 射利的性情有时会显得懒懒散散.

sentences.en: In the Odyssey Homer tells of lotus - eaters who live in dreamy indolence.
sentences.cn: 在《奥德赛》中,荷马记述了生活在梦想中的忘忧国的吃莲花的人.

sentences.en: Its tendency to archaic language was tempered by the indolence of its exponents.
sentences.cn: 它的应用古语的趋势却被用语者的懒散所冲淡.

sentences.en: Must wisdom tooth unplug, so long that need not moment indolence unplug?
sentences.cn: 智慧牙一定要拔吗, 长得时候不痛是不是不用拔?

sentences.en: Now the indolence of southern latitudes has captured me.
sentences.cn: 现在南方纬度的怠惰已经捕获我.

sentences.en: Reward lies ahead of diligence , but nothing is gained by indolence.
sentences.cn: 勤有功,嬉无益.

sentences.en: Silliness, ignorance and indolence are very costly!
sentences.cn: 愚蠢 、 无知和懒惰是要付出代价的!

sentences.en: The difficulties in the SALL is persevering it all the time. Human is always indolence, we must beat our nature . Persist to get the desired results.
sentences.cn: 在自主学习的困难是坚持它的所有时间。人总是懒惰，我们必须击败我们的本性。坚持得到想要的结果。

sentences.en: The natural day is very calm, and will hardly reprove his indolence.
sentences.cn: 时光的天性就是沉静, 它不会因此而责备自己的懒惰.

sentences.en: They're the national apology for indolence.
sentences.cn: 他们是我们民族对懒怠的纵容.

sentences.en: Through indolence the rafters sag , and through slackness the house leaks.
sentences.cn: 传10:18因人懒惰、房顶塌下.因人手懒 、 房屋滴漏.

sentences.en: We rode slowly, with pleasant sense of Sunday indolence.
sentences.cn: 我们骑马缓缓而行, 怀着一种礼拜天悠闲自在的愉快心情.

trans.tran_cn: 懒惰，好逸恶劳，懒散，无痛
